typeSystemDescription.name: ChangedToken
typeSystemDescription.description: Marks a token that has been changed from one revision to another.

typeDescription.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.spelling.experiments.errormining.type.ChangedToken
typeDescription.description: Marks a token that has been changed from one revision to another.

featureDescription.name: Position
featureDescription.description: The position in the sentence as the offset counted in tokens. "x a a a a" => 0 "a a x a a" => 2 "a a a a x" => 4
